text: The University of Tarapacá (in Spanish: Universidad de Tarapacá) is a Chilean university with 3 headquarters located in Arica and one in Iquique. It's another university in the north of Chile. == History == It was founded on 1981 but starts in 1982. This university derives from the old headquarter of University of Chile in Arica. == Faculties == * Sciences * Health Sciences * Law & Social Sciences * Education & Humanities * Agronomical Sciences == Other websites == * Universidad de Tarapacá Tar Category:1982 establishments Category:1980s establishments in Chile Category:Tarapacá Region
title: University of Tarapacá
